title: Watch CrossFit Open 20.1, Rich Froning vs Scott Panchik, announcement live
text:
Watch as the CrossFit Open 20.1 is announced, and then the king of the sport, Rich Froning, faces of with one of the top athletes, Scott Panchik.

The CrossFit Open is an online competition, where athletes upload their scores. It takes place across five weeks, with a new workout announced each week. The winner earns at spot at the CrossFit Games.

Rich Froning has won the CrossFit Games four times, and a further four times in the team competition.

Panchik matched his own highest placing at the Games this year, by finishing fourth. Watch below as they face off.
description: Two of the sport’s heavyweights go head to head as the 2020 season gets underway early
